en_EN: Hello.
Hey.
How are you?
What do you want?

es_ES: ¿No puedo saludar a mi hermano sin tener ningún motivo?
en_EN: Can't I say hello to my brother for no reason?
I'm good, thank you for asking.

es_ES: Sé que últimamente no he sido un buen hermano, pero me gustaría volver a llevarnos bien.
en_EN: I know I haven't been a good brother lately, but I'd like to get along again.
Sure…

es_ES: Lo digo en serio... Sé que por mi culpa los he jodido a todos en esta casa, pero lo voy a solucionar.
en_EN: I'm serious... I know it's my fault I've screwed everyone in this house, but I'm going to fix it.

es_ES: Estoy... tratando de solucionarlo y quiero empezar ahora... con nosotros.
en_EN: I'm... trying to figure it out and I want to start now... with us.
Really?

es_ES: ¡Sí! Sé lo solo que te sientes últimamente, papá también está distante con todos por mí…
en_EN: Yeah! I know how lonely you feel lately, dad is also distant with everyone because of me...
Not…
It's not all your fault.

es_ES: Esto es... difícil para todos, así que no te culpo de todo.
en_EN: This is... difficult for everyone, so I don't blame you for everything.
I'm just tired.

es_ES: Lo sé y no sabes cuánto lo lamento.
en_EN: I know and you don't know how sorry I am.
Thank you.

es_ES: Pero sé que has estado ayudando a mamá en todo, incluso conseguiste un trabajo.
en_EN: But I know you've been helping mom with everything, you even got a job.

es_ES: Sé que te va bien, incluso aunque ayudes a la familia con los gastos, te sobra
en_EN: I know they are paying you well, even if you help the family with expenses, you still have leftovers.
What are you trying to say?
I need money.
Is seriously? Again?
I need you to help me.
What do you need it for?

es_ES: No puedo decírtelo, pero es urgente y esta será la última vez que te lo pida
en_EN: I can't tell you, but it's urgent and this will be the last time I'll ask you.

es_ES: Sabía que esta conversacion de mierda era una mentira, ¿viniendo aquí a decirme que volvamos a ser como éramos antes?
en_EN: I knew it, I knew this shit talk was a lie, coming here to tell me to go back to the way we were before?
Fuck off.

es_ES: No te voy a dejar que me hables así.
en_EN: I'm not going to let you talk to me like that.

es_ES: Soy tu hermano y me tenes que hablar con respeto.
en_EN: I am your brother and you have to speak to me with respect.

es_ES: No puedo creer que me pidas respeto, me das asco. Esta familia se está yendo cada vez más en la mierda y es todo tu culpa.
en_EN: I can't believe how you're asking me for respect, you make me sick. This family is sinking deeper and deeper into shit and it's all your fault.
My fault? Shut up and give me what I asked for.
To get high again?
That's none of your business!

es_ES: Solo te lo voy a decir una vez... Dame la plata.
en_EN: I'm just going to ask for it one more time... Give me the money.
#VALUE!
#VALUE!

es_ES: No te voy a dar nada, drogadicto de mierda.
en_EN: I'm not going to give you anything, you fucking drug addict.
Be quiet!
What the fuck is wrong with you?

es_ES: Y, y, yo lo siento, yo no quería, déjame ayudarte...
en_EN: And, and, I'm sorry, I didn't want to, let me help you...

es_ES: ¡No me toques! Agarra lo que queras y andata a la mierda.
en_EN: Do not touch me! Take what you want and get the fuck out of here.
Leave me alone!
#VALUE!
#VALUE!

es_ES: Toma la plata, no puedo creer que seas mi hermano, hace lo que queras, no me importa.
en_EN: Take the money, I can't believe you're my brother, do whatever you want, I don't care.

es_ES: Viste que no era tan dificil
en_EN: You saw that it wasn't that difficult

es_ES: No quiero saber nada mas de vos.
en_EN: I don't want to know anything more about you.
Bastard!
